work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
As a full-stack web developer, I've maintained a high-performance auction house built mainly on Django & React. The roles I've played here:  • Main Backend Dev & Tech Lead - Implemented: new features, JSON endpoints, API integrations, services, web scraping. Also fixed bugs on a daily basis. 
 • Architect - On top of the Django infrastructure I've: designed new features, proposed architecture changes and refactors, implemented code best practices. Also helped to scale the application and make it more testable. 
 • DevOps Specialist - Used GitLab CI/CD toolset to orchestrate the code flow from the dev side all the day down to production, lead the migration of the website services to AWS EC2 and RDS, built customized automation tools, set up the system monitoring tools using New Relic, among others activities. 
 • QA Analyst - On a daily basis I would check in changes and run tests both manually and automatically to ensure all the requirements criteria are met, the system is functional and there is no weakness. Also contributed to the automated tests infrastructure. 
 • Frontend Dev - Built a few React pages that are still production live.

testimonials.text: Solid dev, great guy, knocks problems down like there's no tomorrow.

I have worked with Rafael for about 1 year and a half, initially tutoring him on Python, Django and React, and later working side-by-side solving all sorts of front-end, back-end, and infra structure tasks. Coming from a Mechanical/Electrical Engineer background, the entire web technology was new to him, and he quickly acquired mastery of it. He is a quick learner! Rafael is also eager to assume responsibility and leadership. Back in college he leaded a winning team on a national Robotics competition, and, by the time left the software project we worked together, he was tech leader and designer! Rafael genuinely cares about software quality, best practices, and architectural consistency - concerns which made him teach leader very early on his career. If you are looking for someone to take care of your software project - on all the technological and other tangential aspects associated with it - I recommend you give him a call!
